post.body: i srsly died!
you are spoiled.
LOL wow. Mandi is just getting up and heading out. Who needs sleep!!??!! Guess I'll nap at grandma's house!
Can I skip chirstmas dinner because I have a guest cat who won't stop whining? This was a bad idea. BAD.
Nothing like waiting for a windshield to defrost at 3:30 am.
omg. new blog. can you believe it? http://tinyurl.com/6pb7me
grades are in: Producers Seminar: A, Interactive Media Design: A, Media Design: B. pretty pleased!
cleaning the desk off is a difficult task. why do i have SO MUCH CRAP!
I do beleieve that is an epic fail in the coffee realm. Good thing it wasn't the last of my beans. http://twitpic.com/vyj9
somehow i have avoided going grocery shopping for the past two weeks. and now i have NO FOOD. im hungry :(
going to take a little nap and get back up again! as much as i hate to say it... merry christmas eve, everyone :)
i am so cold i just put my space heater IN MY LAP.
cat moans growls and hisses are SO unpretty
Rummy!! http://twitpic.com/vt2u
Gotta pee so bad and @thematt145 is poking me with his crutches.
The gimp goes shopping. http://twitpic.com/vnuw
false alarm! found the cat! hes hiding in the closet. now if only he will get along with my cat....
yea. the cat hasn't come around for the hour i've been up. must have escaped out the door last night. ugh. how'm i going to explain THAT?
Ummmm. Cat #2 has totally vanished from my apt. Where is he hiding!
still editing at 1am. catchup queen!
